text: Is there a way to change the fonts available in the rich text editor?  We’d like to restrict the list only to on-brand options

I don't think so, but in your module, you could create a font select drop down wiht your own brand fonts... from there you can put your rich text module wrapped in a div with the class that is created from the font selected. example Roboto is selected so it gives you a class of `roboto-override` font... `<div class="{{ module.font-select }}">{{ module.richtext_content }}</div>`
then in your css `.roboto-override * { font-family: Roboto; }`
That’s interesting, thanks for that workaround!
I'm sure you could do a few other ways, but this is how I would approach that
